## Risk factors for Cardiovascular disease
* Smoking
* Type 2 Diabetes
* High cholesterol levels
* Alcohol
* Obesity 

```{r}
y <- 17
print(y+4)
```

## Types of Myocardial Infarction
1. Spontaneous MI caused by primary coronary event such as plaque rupture\
2. Ischaemia due to mismatch between oxygen demand and delivery\
3. Unexpected cardiac death
4. Iatrogenic causes due to stenting and PCI\
5. Iatrogenic causes due to CABG\
